name: Ruined Hall
description: You stand in a dimly lit ruined hall that is wide and very long. Light streams in through cracks in the walls and ceiling. The ceiling is very high above you and there is a solid stone altar at the far end, engraved with a runic symbol. There are doorways that lead to the north and south and another that leads outside to the west.

look: The columns are cracked and crumbling in places but still sturdily hold up the hall.
The altar is a large piece of white stone. Engraved on its surface is a large, runic symbol.
